Hi! I'm Marius, and I co-founded <url1>QED</url1>, <strike>a blockchain technology company from <url2>Timisoara, Romania</url2>.</strike> In 2024, QED was acquired by <url3>Sandbox</url3>.

Outside of the tech world, I'm the President of <url4>Viitorul Boxing Club</url4> (and a soon-to-be certified boxing coach), where I use my leadership skills to promote healthy behaviors and well-being in our community.

Apart from boxing, I'm passionate about learning. My worldview is influenced by the ideas of great thinkers such as <url5>Jacques Lacan</url5>, <url6>Jean Baudrillard</url6>, <url7>Friedrich Hayek</url7>, and <url8>Richard Feynman</url8>.
